attributes.action: Repeal the London Conventions Act 1964 and take back control of British waters.
attributes.background: This act, enacted as a precursor to joining the common market, allows access to British fishing water to European nations and needs to be repealed in n order to take back control of British fishing territory.

rejection.details:
We're not sure what you mean by the "London Conventions Act 1964". We can't find an Act of Parliament from 1964 with that name. You can view all UK legislation here:

http://www.legislation.gov.uk/

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/185827
